name: Peninsula Venture Partners
overview: Peninsula Ventures is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in early stage investments, mezzanine financing and bridge financing. The firm seeks to invest in technology sector with a focus on software related to data aggregation/optimization, social technology, virality/sharing, software as a service; on infrastructure related to mobile applications, video edge, cloud computing, security and networking, virtualization and data protection; and on core technology related to advanced materials and devices, alternative energy-demand reduction, network/communications infrastructure, security, wireless communications, mobile technologies. It typically invests in United States based companies with a focus on Western U.S. Peninsula Ventures is based in Menlo Park, California.

funding_round.source_description: Green Plug Announces Series B Investment In Its Environmentally-Friendly DC Power Technology
